main event: An unidentified object was observed on ground radar and by a civilian in Albuquerque, New Mexico on July 23, 1961.
interesting points: The object may have been a balloon or low-speed aircraft., The civilian witness reported seeing the object move slowly and steadily., No visual confirmation was made by radar operators., The observation lasted for about 5 minutes., A balloon was released from Kirtland AFB shortly before the sighting.
witness description: Civilian, elderly female and retired government worker, reported with her daughter.
